translations: （被）压紧，压缩；精简，浓缩；压缩（文件等）；压缩声音信号的动态范围（compress的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: The main arguments were compressed into one chapter.
sentences.translation: 主要的论证被压缩进了一个章节。

sentences.sentence: The four debates will be compressed into an eight-day period.
Jets of compressed air gave the aircraft lateral and directional stability.
sentences.translation: 压缩气体喷流从侧面和正面稳定了机身。
